mapper.insert: insert into data_source (pid, storage_cycle, start_time, status) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update data_source set storage_cycle=#{month} where did=#{did}
mapper.select: select * from data_source where pid=#{pid} and status=0
select * from data_source where pid in (select pid from product where pname like concat('%',#{pname},'%')) and status=0 limit #{begin},10
select * from data_source where pid in (select pid from product where pname like concat('%',#{pname},'%')) and storage_cycle=#{time} and status=0 limit #{begin},10
select * from data_source where status=0 limit #{begin},10
mapper.update: update data_source SET status =1 WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'))>=storage_cycle and status=0;
